channel.title: Is it possible to get 100% uptime back?
channel.description: so two nights ago, my vps restarted due to system updates it had perform. and it shut my server down for about 6 to 7hrs. i dropped to 99% uptime. (now on second page) :palm: just wanted to no if its possible to get 100% uptime back and get my number 11 spot back on the server status board.

item.title: Is it possible to get 100% uptime back?

Today is the best day of sk8r’s life

item.title: Is it possible to get 100% uptime back?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Short answer: Yes.

Long answer: The server percent is rounded up, so once your server hits 99.5% online again, it will round back up to 100%.

Please read the F.A.Q posted here: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363862.0.html

Read full topic
item.source: Is it possible to get 100% uptime back?

item.title: Is it possible to get 100% uptime back?
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

Well first I would be wondering why it automatically installed those updates. And second, why didn’t you have the server run on start up?

Read full topic
